text: Gil Fates (born Joseph Gilbert Fates on 29 September 1914 in Newark, New Jersey, United States; died 1 May 2000 in New York City, United States) was an American television producer. He produced many shows, like What's My Line?. Fates also hosted CBS Television Quiz, which was the first television game show to be shown often. Before World War 2, he was a stage actor. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American television producers Category:American stage actors Category:American game show hosts Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Businesspeople from Newark, New Jersey Category:Screenwriters from New Jersey
title: Gil Fates
